name.title: Name
name.description: Unique name for the plugin step

friendlyName.title: Friendly Name
friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the plugin step

description.title: Description
description.description: Optional description of the plugin step

stage.title: Stage
stage.description: Stage of execution for the plugin step

executionMode.title: Execution Mode
executionMode.description: Defines whether the step is executed synchronously (blocking user interaction) or asynchronously

message.title: Message
message.description: SDK Message trigger for this step, e.g. Create, Update, Delete
message.$comment: !! IDEA !! Could 1 or many messages here - would register a step for each to save typing out multiple steps?

primaryEntity.title: Primary Entity
primaryEntity.description: Logical name of the entity to which this step is bound, e.g. contact, account. new_customentity
primaryEntity.$comment: !! IDEA !! Could 1 or many entities here - would register a step for each to save typing out multiple steps?

executionOrder.title: Execution Order
executionOrder.description: Order of execution when multiple steps are registered against the same entity and message

asyncAutoDelete.title: Delete System Job if Successful
asyncAutoDelete.description: For Asynchronous jobs only, deletes the System Job record if the result is sucessful

filteringAttributes.title: Filtering Attributes
filteringAttributes.description: Filters triggering execution to changes in specific attributes on the primary entity. Not supported for Create or Delete

unsecureConfiguration.title: Unsecure Configuration
unsecureConfiguration.description: Public custom configuration that is passed to a plug-in's constructor

secureConfiguration.title: Secure Configuration
secureConfiguration.description: Non-public custom configuration that is passed to a plug-in's constructor

entityImages.title: Entity Images
entityImages.description: Array of entity images (snapshot of the primary entity data, pre- or post-update) to be passed to the plugin execution
